textBeforeTable: Available Releases Development Maturity: Content Object Categories: ZopeOrgSite Author: 2005-03-13 02:14:03 Last Updated: 0.1 Latest Release: Contact Email: thomas.e.hoffman@verizon.net The CVS Repository The Tuttle SVC weblog You can also check out: tools for managing users and roles. a simple data structure, such as a standard data structure and methods for student portfolios and teacher's records; school-wide variables like school name and address, and some more complex data like schedule information; Tuttle is a lightweight framework to aid in the development, deployment and use of Zope products which support teaching and learning in small schools. I have paused development on this iteration of Tuttle, as I'm trying to work out how it should relate it into Plone or Silva. We do use Tuttle behind the scenes at our school to manage rosters and assessment data. It has worked just fine. This product should provide a few services to users and contained applications: Tuttle Small School Framework   DublinCore
textAfterTable: Copyright (c) 2011 Zope Foundation. All rights reserved. Legal | Contact If you can read this text, it means you are not experiencing the Plone design at its best. Plone makes heavy use of CSS, which means it is accessible to any internet browser, but the design needs a standards-compliant browser to look like we intended it. Just so you know ;)
